name: The Dark Forest Guardians
description:
(The Dark Forest Guardians) is a 2d platform game in pixel art, tells the story of Hanzo a warrior who hides his past, he finds himself in a crisis situation and receives a request for help in which he decides to help.

You have a mission! Helping those who need you, but without setting aside your revenge.

Features:

  • Long story.
  • different challenges.
  • bosses along the journey.
  • high difficulty.
  • pixel art.
  • souls game.
  • upgrades of player.
  • second missions.
  • Days or more

Requirements

  • Disk space: 330MB
  • 2G of RAM (Minimum).
  • Keyboard and Mouse.
